bibl.title: Λογεία-Receipts and the Construction of Deir Shelwit.
bibl.note: 23 Theban ostraca (bilingual, Demotic and Greek; all published), dating almost exclusively to the reigns of Claudius and Nero, mention a "collection of the god". Examines the precise origin of the receipts [Deir Shelwit, at the border of Djeme and Armant].
bibl.seg: KLOTZ David, Λογεία-Receipts and the Construction of Deir Shelwit.

23 Theban ostraca (bilingual, Demotic and Greek; all published), dating almost exclusively to the reigns of Claudius and Nero, mention a "collection of the god". Examines the precise origin of the receipts [Deir Shelwit, at the border of Djeme and Armant].
